meta.title: Kirubel Tolosa | Senior .NET / Full-Stack Engineer
meta.description: Senior backend-focused Full Stack Engineer specializing in cloud-native, distributed, and secure systems across Azure and AWS.

hero.title: Senior backend-focused Full Stack Engineer
hero.summary: 9+ years building secure, cloud-native distributed systems on Azure and AWS. Deep .NET expertise across microservices, event-driven architecture, high-throughput data processing, and API security, with experience integrating AI-enabled capabilities.

stats.label: Backend
stats.value: .NET Core, ASP.NET, C#, SQL Server, MongoDB

bullets: Modernized a monolith into 12 independently scalable .NET Core microservices on Kubernetes, cutting deploy cycles from ~1 hour to under 5 minutes per service.
Built a distributed Windows background monitoring and automated recovery service supporting 20+ application servers, significantly reducing downtime.
Designed a modular, plugin-driven backend architecture using MEF + MongoDB + EF Core to speed domain module delivery.
Delivered 5+ production Angular apps and REST APIs for telemetry, equipment initialization, and operational reporting.
Implemented containerization, health checks, load balancing, and automated deployment patterns.
Mentored junior engineers on clean coding, unit testing, microservice design, and pipeline practices.
Built a Data Services .NET Core microservice for accrual, rollover, proration, and payout calculations; integrated into APIM with attribute-based filters.
Reduced batch processing time from hours to under 10 seconds by redesigning workflows with Azure Durable Entities and optimizing Java background processors.
Delivered Time Off Rules APIs with automated unit/integration test suites (MSTest + Moq), reducing regressions.
Implemented UI + server-side features for Rollover-to-Types, Expire Rollover, Proration, and Payout/Earning configurations.
Built Snowflake employee mapping and company-scoped preload pipelines for high-volume ingestion.
Refactored Accrual UI into modern Angular/React reusable components and resolved IDOR vulnerabilities.
Built a Knowledge Mining & AI search service using Azure Cognitive Search, processing 10M+ unstructured healthcare data.
Designed backend architecture with SQL Server + ASP.NET MVC for imaging-center workflows and indexed data access.
Integrated Azure Logic Apps for email analysis and automated recording into SQL databases.
Extended Azure Function Apps for cognitive enrichment, classification, and vector embedding integration.
Implemented Azure AD authentication and authorization for MVC search UI applications.
Built white-label UI configuration flows using Azure App Configuration and delivered CI/CD pipelines.
Built time-series data pipelines for wrangling, decomposition, filtering, and feature engineering in R and Python.
Developed EEG signal analysis and modeling pipelines for temporal neural decision validation.
Designed SQL Server relational databases for ASP.NET MVC imaging center web applications.
Built 3D/VR data visualization modules using Unreal Engine (C++), CouchDB APIs, and geospatial data layers.
Delivered GIS story map applications combining R, Python, JavaScript, and relational data layers.
Built high-throughput REST APIs and ASP.NET MVC applications for transactional enterprise systems.
Designed SQL Server and PL/SQL databases, stored procedures, indexes, and performance optimizations.
Delivered JavaScript and React SPAs with responsive UI and AJAX integration.
Wrote 100+ unit and integration tests using MSTest to improve release reliability.

items.name: Microservices Platform Modernization
items.description: Re-architected a monolith into Kubernetes-hosted .NET microservices with automated CI/CD and resilient background monitoring.

items.name: Time Off Rules & Accrual Engine
items.description: Built high-volume accrual and rules services with APIM integration, durable workflows, and optimized batch processing.

items.name: Knowledge Mining & AI Search
items.description: Delivered an AI-powered search MVP that processed 100K+ unstructured records with custom enrichment and vector capabilities.

items.name: Distributed Systems & AI Research Tooling
items.description: Built data pipelines, EEG modeling, and 3D/VR visualization modules supporting academic research initiatives.

awards.name: USM COVID App Innovation Challenge
awards.detail: Built symptom tracking APIs and follow-up COVID patient monitoring application.

contact.title: Contact
contact.blurb: Open to senior backend and full-stack roles, consulting, and platform modernization engagements.
